entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
